import React, { useState } from 'react'; const App: React.FC = () => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); const toggleForm = () => { setIsLogin(!isLogin); }; return (

Welcome to the Tourist App

Explore various tourist destinations and plan your trips!

{isLogin ? (

Login

) : (

Signup

)}
); }; export default App;
